tags.name: raw
tags.content: #x.domain.node.tagparent#`"<tag content>"`# — Full tag reference with explicit content inside backticks.

tags.name: compressed
tags.content: #x.domain.node.tagparent#t.tag1,tag2# — Lightweight syntax for referencing multiple tags inside a known tagparent.

tags.name: clarity
tags.content: Use raw format while defining new tag content. Use compressed form when reusing existing tags from another file.
